#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int Lint;

int main() {
	
	Lint t, n, q, start, end, i, j, flag, v;

	scanf("%lld", &t);

	while( t-- ) {

		scanf("%lld %lld", &n, &q );

		vector< pair<Lint, Lint> > A( n );

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {
			scanf("%lld %lld", &start, &end );
			pair<Lint, Lint> B;
			B.first = start;
			B.second = end;
			A[ i ] =  B;
		}

		for( i = 1;i <= q;i++ ) {

			scanf("%lld", &v );
			flag = 1;

			for( j = 0;j < n;j++ ) {

//				cout << "V : " << v << " A[ j ].first : " << A[ j ].first << " A[ j ].second : " << A[ j ].second << endl; 
				if( ( v >= A[ j ].first ) && ( v <= A[ j ].second ) ) {
					flag = 0;
					break;
				}
			}

			if( flag )
				printf("YES\n");
			else
				printf("NO\n");
		}

	}
	return 0;
}
